title: Stylish Coastal Stay in the Kimberley Region
description: Escape to the picturesque Roebuck Bay - famed for its rich red soil and aquamarine waters - on the striking coastline of Western Australia’s Kimberley Region. Surrounded by stunning landscaped gardens, enjoy a stay in a self-contained, one-bedroom apartment at Oaks Broome with daily buffet breakfast, a glass of house wine or beer with every main meal purchased, Wi-Fi access and a convenient and guaranteed late 12pm checkout.

title: Tranquil Broome Escape near Cable Beach with Daily Breakfast
description: Incredibly remote yet utterly alluring, Broome’s beauty is undeniable. Hidden in Western Australia’s Kimberley Region, where the turquoise waters and beautiful white sands of the famous Cable Beach meet the sunset, this is a region that stands unparalleled for its natural splendour. Take it all in at your own pace in luxurious style at The Pearle of Cable Beach, fringed by tropical palm trees and home to a glittering infinity pool. Includes daily continental breakfast and complimentary daily housekeeping.

title: Iconic Coastal Escape Overlooking Cable Beach
description: Escape to Western Australia’s striking coastline, staying 100 metres from Broome’s 23-kilometre stretch of pristine sand at the iconic Cable Beach. Nestled amid gently-swaying palm trees, flaming Indian Ocean sunsets, white sand beaches and sapphire waters, Cable Beach Club Resort & Spa boasts first-class facilities in the striking Kimberley region. Indulge in a five-night stay with daily buffet breakfast, welcome bottle of sparkling wine on arrival, AU$50 dining credit to share and a daily AU$30 spa credit to share.
offer_address: 1 Cable Beach Rd E, Broome WA 6725

title: Central Oaks Broome Escape near Cable Beach with Daily Breakfast
description:
Soak up the unique beauty of Western Australia with a stay at Oaks Broome Hotel, surrounded by lush landscaped gardens just steps from the glittering waterfront at Roebuck Bay. Whether you are looking to explore Broome Town Centre with its shops, restaurants, and bars, or experience the iconic beauty of a sunset camel ride at Cable Beach, Oaks Broome Hotel provides the perfect launching point from which to explore a variety of natural treasures, alluring landscapes and adventure pursuits.

When you're not exploring, relax and unwind amid tropical gardens in the hotel’s two swimming pools. Feeling hungry? 1861 Restaurant & Bar - named after the defining year in which the largest pearl oyster in the world (Pinctada Maxima) was discovered - will have all your cravings covered with modern Australian delicacies and pub favourites.

title: Boutique Cable Beach Escape with Daily Breakfast & Complimentary Cocktails
description: Immerse yourself in the unique beauty of Broome at Kimberley Sands Resort, hidden within the unspoiled landscape of Western Australia’s otherworldly Kimberley region. Just steps from the turquoise waters and white sands of iconic Cable Beach, this top-rated resort - ranked in Tripadvisor's Top 10 Inns in Broome - offers secluded relaxation, with a tropical pool and semi-alfresco restaurant where you can sip sundowners with someone special.

title: Award-winning Beachside Eco Resort in Broome
description: Reconnect with nature on a unique two-night beachside eco-glamping experience in Broome. Includes daily continental breakfasts, a bottle of wine on arrival, spa credit, complimentary yoga, one-day use of kayaks and paddle boards to explore the surrounding Indian Ocean - home to whales and turtles, and more
offer_address: 323 Station Great Northern Highway, Broome WA 6725

title: Central Broome Escape near Cable Beach with Daily Breakfast
description:
Soak up the unique beauty of Western Australia with a stay at Oaks Broome Hotel - surrounded by lush landscaped gardens and just one street from Roebuck Bay in the stunning Kimberley region.

Remote yet utterly alluring, Broome’s beauty is undeniable. Sitting on the edge of the Kimberley, where the turquoise waters and beautiful white sands of the famous Cable Beach meet the sunset, this is a region that is unparalleled for its natural splendour. Take it all in at your own pace from one of Oaks Broome Hotel’s stylish hotel rooms and self-contained apartments, complete with serene pool views and modern amenities, just a short walk to Roebuck Bay and Broome's collection of laidback cafés, bars and restaurants.

title: Iconic Coastal Escape Overlooking Cable Beach
description: Escape to Western Australia’s striking coastline, staying 100 metres from Broome’s 23-kilometre stretch of pristine sand at the iconic Cable Beach. Nestled amid gently swaying palm trees, flaming Indian Ocean sunsets, white sand beaches and sapphire waters, Cable Beach Club Resort & Spa boasts first-class facilities in the striking Kimberley region. Indulge in an unforgettable stay with daily buffet breakfast, welcome bottle of sparkling wine on arrival, a nightly cocktail overlooking the sunset, return transfers from Broome Airport and an AU$30 spa credit each.
offer_address: 1 Cable Beach Rd W, Broome WA 6725

title: Serene Broome Apartment Escape Moments From Cable Beach
description:
Soak up the unique beauty of Western Australia with a stay at the modern Oaks Broome Hotel - a coastal oasis surrounded by lush landscaped gardens in the stunning Kimberley region.

Incredibly remote yet utterly alluring, Broome’s beauty is undeniable. Hidden on the edge of the Kimberley, where the turquoise waters and beautiful white sands of the famous Cable Beach meet the sunset, this is a region that stands unparalleled for its natural splendour. Take it all in at your own pace from one of Oaks Broome Hotel’s stylish self-contained apartments, complete with serene pool views and modern amenities, just a short walk from Town Beach and Broome's collection of laidback cafés, bars and restaurants.

title: Award-Winning Eco-Friendly Kimberley Glamping & Villa Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
There’s magic in the Kimberley, and no better place to discover it than at the award-winning Eco Beach Wilderness Retreat, wonderfully positioned just 90 minutes from Broome. Slow down and savour time spent on Western Australia’s most spectacular coastline - kayak through the sapphire waters of the Indian Ocean, descend into sunken sandstone caves (an easy walk from the retreat) or stand in awe as the moon enters star-filled skies above rambling bush plains. With eco-friendly accommodation to suit every traveller - including canvas glamping tents and spacious villas, each tailored specifically for couples or families - and a spectacular oceanfront infinity pool, there’s no finer place to take it all in.

Eco Beach Wilderness Retreat offers a wealth of impressive facilities. Head to Jack’s Bar & Restaurant for laidback modern Australian bites drawing on the region’s extraordinary local produce, or hire a fishing rod and hit the sands to catch your own meals. Dragonfly Day Spa offers daily yoga classes and wellness treatments, many delivered directly on the beach.
offer_address: 323 Great Northern Highway, Broome, Western Australia 6725, Australia

title: Modern Apartment Stay in the Kimberley Region
description: Escape to the picturesque Roebuck Bay, famed for its rich red soil and aquamarine waters, on the striking coastline of Western Australia’s Kimberley Region. Enjoy a stay in a modern and compact Studio Room at Oaks Broome, a coastal oasis surrounded by stunning landscaped gardens, and enjoy daily buffet and a la carte breakfast, a welcome drink on arrival and a convenient and guaranteed late 12pm checkout.

title: Award-Winning Broome Apartment Escape at Cable Beach
description:
On the edge of Australia’s vivid landscape in Western Australia’s pristine Kimberley region, Seashells Broome has a jaw-dropping position just steps from the white powdery sands of Cable Beach and the glistening Indian Ocean. A winner in the TripAdvisor Travellers' Choice Awards 2020 and rated among Broome’s top Speciality Lodging on TripAdvisor, this self-contained resort knows how to deliver award-winning comfort with a welcome bottle of wine and guaranteed 12pm late checkout included in your stay.

**Travelling with family or a group?** Upgrade to the spacious Two-Bedroom Apartment, valid for four people.

**Sunset camel safari upgrade available**: Embark on the quintessential Cable Beach experience with an unforgettable camel safari at sunset. Upgrade available for stays in the One-Bedroom Apartment only.
offer_address: 4/6 Challenor Dr, Cable Beach WA 6726, Australia

title: Top-Rated Broome Apartments near Cable Beach
description:
Escape to the edge of Western Australia’s pristine Kimberley region with a stay at the award-winning Seashells Broome. The resort boasts an impressive location just 300m from the white powdery sands of Cable Beach and the glistening Indian Ocean - making it the ideal destination for a sun-kissed stay.

Currently ranked in Broome’s top five Specialty Lodgings on Tripadvisor and holder of a Travellers' Choice 2020 award, Seashells Broome’s accolades and incredible facilities are reason enough to stay - but its location is what makes it the place to be in Broome. Nestled a mere 10-minute walk from the pillowy sands of the world-famous Cable Beach and a 10-minute drive from central Broome, this self-contained resort invites you to experience the vibrancy of the outback, a stone’s throw from one of Australia's most iconic beaches, heat-beating bars, world-class restaurants, magnificent nature and iconic sights.
offer_address: 4/6 Challenor Dr, Cable Beach WA 6726, Australia

title: Award-Winning Broome Apartment Escape near Cable Beach
description:
Just steps from the white powdery sands of Cable Beach and the glistening Indian Ocean is Seashells Broome, a self-contained apartment resort in an unbeatable location near Broome’s most iconic sites. A Silver winner for Deluxe Accommodation at the 2021 Perth Airport WA Tourism Awards, this self-contained resort knows how to deliver award-winning comfort. Unwind in self-contained one and two-bedroom apartments, or an epic three-bedroom bungalow, and enjoy two refreshing swimming pools (including a kids' paddling pool), a children’s playground, lush resort gardens and BBQ facilities.

Broome is beautiful from every angle and you’re perfectly placed to make the most of its adventurous activities and wildlife when you stay at Seashells Broome. Discover camels crossing Cable Beach against a sunset backdrop, dip your toes into the turquoise Indian Ocean, stroll across pearl-white beaches set against red cliffs and go seasonal whale watching between July and September. If you can tear yourself away from the resort’s pools for a day, make sure to see the Horizontal Falls, described by Sir David Attenborough as ‘Australia’s most unusual natural wonder’.
offer_address: 4/6 Challenor Dr, Cable Beach WA 6726, Australia

title: Central Broome Oaks Escape Just Moments from Cable Beach

Surrounded by lush landscaped gardens and just one street from Roebuck Bay, this collection of stylish hotel rooms and self-contained apartments, complete with serene pool views and modern amenities, are just a short walk from Broome's collection of laidback cafés, bars and restaurants. Remote yet utterly alluring, Broome’s beauty is undeniable. Sitting on the edge of the Kimberley, where the turquoise waters and beautiful white sands of the famous Cable Beach meet the sunset, this is a region that is unparalleled for its natural splendour. Take it all in at your own pace from Oaks Broome Hotel.
offer_address: 99 Robinson St, Broome, Western Australia 6725, Australia

title: Central Broome Apartments Amongst Tropical Gardens Near Cable Beach
description:
Experience the tropical allure of Broome - the gateway to the spectacular Kimberley region - with a self-contained apartment escape. Unwind in spacious one-,  two-, and three-bedroom apartments, and enjoy two refreshing swimming pools, lush resort gardens and BBQ facilities.

Broome is beautiful from every angle and you’re perfectly placed to make the most of its adventurous activities and wildlife when you stay at Mantra Frangipani Broome. Watch camels crossing Cable Beach against a sunset backdrop, dip your toes into the turquoise Indian Ocean and stroll across pearl-white beaches set against red cliffs.
offer_address: 15 Millington Road, Broome, Western Australia, 6726, Australia
